message: I'm posting this in the python group, because in its current early form, it requires some understanding of python to get it up and running
I've posted a tool that lets you get notifications of assorted events on Convore via a set of different notification channels: https://github.com/ptone/notifyore
just as a random note, libnotify isn't Ubuntu specific, and essentially all distributions ship it

Just occurred to me, that creating a simple 'mark as read' action would be easy to do, and would provide a simple solution to 'ignoring' certain topics or users. https://github.com/ptone/notifyore/issues/4
nice. Too bad it will be too distracting :)
